customize_features.name: multiselect
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the multiselect panel from interface.

customize_features.name: export_render
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the button to render the current layer.

customize_features.name: export_excel
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the button to export the current layer to MS Excel (.xlsx) format.

customize_features.name: legend
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the legend panel from the interface.

customize_features.name: background_color
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the background color effect on manually assigned colors.

customize_features.name: non_aggregate_score_color
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the color effect on non-aggregate scores.

customize_features.name: aggregate_score_color
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the color effect on aggregate scores.

customize_features.name: comment_underline
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the comment underline effect on techniques.

customize_features.name: metadata_underline
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the metadata underline effect on techniques.

customize_features.name: link_underline
customize_features.description: Disable to remove the hyperlink underline effect on techniques.

features.name: leave_site_dialog
features.description: Disable to remove the dialog prompt when leaving site.

features.name: tabs
features.description: Disable to remove the ability to open new tabs.

features.name: header
features.description: Disable to remove the header containing banner.

features.name: selection_controls
features.description: Disable to to disable all subfeatures

subfeatures.name: search
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the technique search panel from the interface.

subfeatures.name: deselect_all
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the deselect all button from the interface.

subfeatures.name: selecting_techniques
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the ability to select techniques.

subfeatures.name: layer_settings
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the layer info (name, description and layer metadata) panel from the interface. Note that the layer can still be renamed in the tab.

subfeatures.name: download_layer
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the button to download the layer.

subfeatures.name: filters
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the filters panel from interface.

subfeatures.name: sorting
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the sorting button from the interface.

subfeatures.name: color_setup
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the color setup panel from interface, containing customization controls for scoring gradient and tactic row color.

subfeatures.name: toggle_hide_disabled
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the hide disabled techniques button from the interface.

subfeatures.name: subtechniques
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove all sub-technique features from the interface.

subfeatures.name: disable_techniques
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the ability to disable techniques.

subfeatures.name: manual_color
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the ability to assign manual colors to techniques.

subfeatures.name: scoring
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the ability to score techniques.

subfeatures.name: comments
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the ability to add comments to techniques.

subfeatures.name: links
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the ability to assign hyperlinks to techniques.

subfeatures.name: metadata
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the ability to add metadata to techniques.

subfeatures.name: clear_annotations
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the button to clear all annotations on the selected techniques.

subfeatures.name: sticky_toolbar
subfeatures.description: Disable to remove the ability to enable/disable the sticky toolbar.
